pages.text: As witches delve deeper into witchcraft, they will come to notice the power found within the different realms of existence, brimming with magical energy, resonating through all the different planes, but ultimately anchored to the three main realms of minecraftia, The Overworld, The Nether and The End. $(br) $(br)However such energies can not

be accessed with ease. Rather, any witch who wishes to do so, would first have to imbue itself with the imprint of the dimension, thus gaining access to the power contained within the dimension itself. $(br) $(br)Such imbuement allows the witch not only to have much more power available, increasing the MP cap considerably, but to also have a noticeable increase in it's recharge rate, should the witch be in the dimension that

was imbued.  $(br) $(br)Three are the different infusions known to witchcraft, infusion of the Overworld, infusion of the Nether and Infusion of the End. However, there are rumors of a fourth infusion, infusion that witches can only dream about. $(br) $(br)A word of warning, however. Given the sheer amount of of power imbued in oneself during this process, a witch willing to undergo an infusion should
prepare it's body, since the process is rather deadly.
